name: Cebujeepneyroute
body:
03-A    MABOLO (PANAGDAIT) - CARBON

From Mabolo Panagdait, RT  Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), RT M.J. Cuenco Ave. to New Road, LT M.J.Cuenco Ave., RT V. Gullas St., to Manalili St., LT J. Leyson St. (Progresso St.), to M.C.Briones St., LT  Lapu-lapu St., RT Jeresa St., LT M.J.Cuenco Ave., to New Road proceed to M.J. Cuenco, LT Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), RT F. Cabahug to Panagdait.

03-B    MABOLO – OSMEÑA BLVD. - CARBON

 

From Mabolo Sindulan St., LT F. Gochan St., LT S. Cabahug St., LT Tres Borces St., RT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT Gen. Maxilom Ave. passing Fuente Rotunda proceed Osmena Blvd., RT P. Lopez St., LT Magallanes St., RT Manalili St., LT Leyson St. to M.C. Briones St., LT Lapu-lapu St., RT Jeresa St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., to New Road proceed to M.J. CuencoAve., LT Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), RT to S. Cabahug to Mabolo Sindulan St.

03-C    MABOLO - CARBON – OSMEÑA BLVD.

From Mabolo Tres Borces St., RT at M. J. Cuenco Ave., RT V. Gullas St., to Manalili St., LT Leyson St., to M.C.Briones St., LT  Lapu-lapu St. LT Osmeña Blvd., to Fuente Osmeña Rotunda, RT Gen. Maxilom Ave., LT at M. J. Cuenco Ave., LT at Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), ( San Jose de la Montaña ), RT at S. Cabahug St. to Mabolo Tres Broces St.

03-D    MABOLO - LAHUG -  CAPITOL – CARBON

From Mabolo Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.) to Salinas Drive, LT Gorordo Ave., RT Escario St., LT Osmena Blvd., to Fuente Osmeña Rotunda back to Osmeña Blvd., RT Plaridel St., LT M.C. Briones St., LT Lapu-lapu St., RT Jeresa St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., to New Road, to M. J. Cuenco Ave., to Mabolo Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.)

03-G    MABOLO (Gochan)  – CARBON

From Mabolo Tres Borces, LT Borgonia St., RT Go Chan St., RT Cebu North Road, follow M.J. Cuenco Ave., to New Road, LT M.J.Cuenco Ave.,  RT to V. Gullas St., to Manalili St.,  LT to J. Leyson St. (Progresso St.) to M. C. Briones St., LT Lapu-lapu St., RT Jeresa St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT to New Road, to M. J. Cuenco Ave., LT to Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), right  turn  S. Cabahug St. to Mabolo Tres Borces St.

03-L    MABOLO (LUYO) – CARBON 

From Mabolo (Luyo) Cabantan, RT Arch. Reyes Ave., RT Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), RT to M.J. Cuenco Ave., to New Road, LT M.J.Cuenco Ave., RT to V. Gullas St., to Manalili St., LT to J. Leyson St. (Progresso St.) proceed to M. C. Briones St., LT Lapu-lapu St., RT Jeresa St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT to New Road, to M. J. Cuenco Ave., LT to L. Tudtud St., RT to Guibilondo St., LT to Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), LT to New Era to Mabolo (Luyo) Cabantan.

03-K    MABOLO - AYALA - COLON – SM - NORTH BUS TERMINAL

 

From Ayala Loading/Unloading Area RT Cardinal Rosales Ave., LT Samar Loop, RT Cardinal Rosales Ave., RT Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), RT M.J. Cuenco Ave., to New Road, LT M.J.Cuenco Ave RT V. Gullas St., RT Borromeo St., RT Colon St., LT Mabini St., RT Zulueta St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT T. Padilla Extn., LT Benedicto to J.C. Veyra St., LT Juan Luna St., RT A. Soriano St., RT Cabahug St., LT Urot to North Bus Terminal. From North Bus Terminal follow F. Urot St., RT Cabahug St., LT A. Soriano St., RT Juan Luna Ave.(San Jose de la Montaña), LT Cardinal Rosales to Ayala loading/unloading Area.

03-M    MABOLO – SM – AYALA - COLON

 

From SM follow Juan Luna Ave. (San Jose de la Montaña St.), LT Cardinal Rosales St., to Ayala Loading/Unloading Area, RT Luzon Ave., RT Bohol St., RT to Mindanao Ave., LT to Cardinal Rosales St., RT to Juan Luna Ave.(San Jose de la Montaña St.),RT A. Soriano St., RT Gen. Maxilom Ext., LT New Road, RT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT  V. Gullas St., to Manalili St., RT Borromeo St., RT Colon St., LT Mabini St., RT Zulueta St., LT M.J. Cuenco Ave., RT T. Padilla Ext., LT Benedicto St. follow to JC Veyra St., LT SM Juan Luna Ave.

03-Q   MABOLO – AYALA – SM

From Ayala Loading/Unloading Area RT Cardinal Rosales Ave., RT Luzon Ave., RT Bohol St., RT Mindanao Ave., LT Cardinal Rosales Ave., LT Cabantan St., RT Arch. Reyes Ave., RT J. Luna Ave.(San Jose de la Monataña St.), LT A. Soriano, RT Kaoshiung St., RT S. Osmeña Ave.,, RT Juan Luna Ave.(San Jose de la Monataña St.), LT Cardinal Rosales Ave, to Ayala Loading/Unloading Area.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
